page.title: 02Just North of Docklands
page.content: Our area lies to the immediate north of London Docklands the regeneration of which is the most important development in Europe during the 80s.It promises to provide unique opportunities for people residing here,investors and businesses. For residents there are to be a wide range of attractive,well-sited homes; for investors and businesses,sites with high investment potential and schemes to set up new or re-located enterprises The major advantage of Docklands is the close proximity to the centre of London only 10 minutes away.The waterscape has a total area of 20 sq kms or 8 sq miles where the once famous Port of London used to be.The 4 areas of Docklands are Wapping,Isle of Dogs,the Royal Docks and Surrey Docks and the Enterprise Zone.History will know if the plans were a success or not. Frank MacDonald
